title: Landon Babcock Business Lessons From A 7 Year Old
itunes:title: Landon Babcock Business Lessons From A 7 Year Old
description:
Have you set your business up for success? It doesn’t matter how small or large the operation - set a goal and maintain that vision.

Zach’s son Landon Babcock is a budding entrepreneur and master lemonade salesman. At only seven years old he is already setting records in the industry by pulling in a three-digit revenue in only two hours. However, to Landon’s dismay, the profit had to be divided up between him and his team which encouraged him to revisit his business plan. 

On this episode of Underdog Empowerment, Zach and Landon discuss the lessons learned from their lemonade stand and how the successful operation helped realign Landon’s vision board. Listen in for an episode that will simply make you smile.

Show Notes: https://underdogempowerment.com/landon-babcock

  3. Access Our Top Resource Recommendations: https://underdogempowerment.com/resources/
  4. Subscribe On YouTube: https://underdogempowerment.com/youtube
